entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
